notes.text:
An updated python-backports-ssl_match_hostname package that fixes one
security issue is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux OpenStack
Platform 4.0.

Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having Low security
impact. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which
gives a detailed severity rating, is available from the CVE link in the
References section.
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
The python-backports-ssl_match_hostname package provides RFC 6125 compliant
wildcard matching.

A denial of service flaw was found in the way Python's SSL module
implementation performed matching of certain certificate names. A remote
attacker able to obtain a valid certificate that contained multiple
wildcard characters could use this flaw to issue a request to validate such
a certificate, resulting in excessive consumption of CPU. (CVE-2013-2099)

This issue was discovered by Florian Weimer of Red Hat Product Security.

All python-backports-ssl_match_hostname users are advised to upgrade to
this updated package, which contains a backported patch to correct this
issue.
notes.title: Details

acknowledgments.summary: This issue was discovered by Red Hat.

notes.text: A denial of service flaw was found in the way Python's SSL module implementation performed matching of certain certificate names. A remote attacker able to obtain a valid certificate that contained multiple wildcard characters could use this flaw to issue a request to validate such a certificate, resulting in excessive consumption of CPU.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: python: ssl.match_hostname() DoS via certificates with specially crafted hostname wildcard patterns
notes.title: Vulnerability summary

notes.text: This issue did not affect the versions of python as shipped with Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5 and 6 as the SSL module there did not implement the match_hostname() routine yet.
notes.title: Statement

notes.text: The CVSS score(s) listed for this vulnerability do not reflect the associated product's status, and are included for informational purposes to better understand the severity of this vulnerability.
notes.title: CVSS score applicability

remediations.details:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously released errata
relevant to your system have been applied.

This update is available via the Red Hat Network. Details on how to
use the Red Hat Network to apply this update are available at
https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258

vulnerabilities.title: python: ssl.match_hostname() DoS via certificates with specially crafted hostname wildcard patterns
